qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: By hosting single-versioned software coupled with supplementary delivery and maintenance services, SaaS vendors can effectively differentiate their product offerings from that of traditional on-premise software (TOPS)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define a proposta de valor SaaS baseada em software de versão única com serviços suplementares, caracterizando o modelo de entrega e a orientação a serviços.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: For clients, the consumption of innovation is faster as new capabilities are released simultaneously with each service upgrade. For vendors, the complexities and costs associated with managing and maintaining multiple software versions can be eliminated
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca os benefícios da implantação de versão única tanto para clientes (inovação rápida) quanto para fornecedores (redução de custos e complexidade).

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: The second challenge comes from the diversity of SaaS clients, among which small and medium enterprises have been the most aggressive adopters. Likewise, large corporations are equally attracted to the idea of acquiring software services on demand
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica dois segmentos de mercado distintos (PMEs e grandes corporações) e o modelo de acesso sob demanda como proposta de valor.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: clients are charged through recurring subscription fees on a pay-as-you-go basis...For SaaS licenses to be sustainable, software vendors would have to take into account not only the costs of hosting and maintaining the software, but also the costs associated with the provision of supplementary services
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve o modelo de receita baseado em assinaturas recorrentes e pagamento por uso, elementos centrais da estratégia de precificação SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Cost-based pricing makes sense for SaaS because the remote hosting of software services culminates in significant variable costs for vendors
qualitative_analysis.justification: Relaciona a estratégia de precificação baseada em custos com a infraestrutura de hospedagem remota e seus custos variáveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: by the pure-SaaS model, all the participants in a project gained easy and instant access to the software wherever they were located physically
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca a proposta de valor do SaaS com acesso fácil e instantâneo independente da localização física dos usuários.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: Firm A prefers software renting on the grounds that it brings cost savings by decreasing production costs. These cost savings are related in particular to the traveling costs for installation, implementation, maintenance, and after-sales support
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra como o modelo de aluguel de software reduz custos operacionais, gerando economias de escala.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: the final revenue is shared with the partners in the value chain... It is based on revenue sharing between three players, the content owner, a portal, and ourselves
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve um modelo de negócio baseado em compartilhamento de receita entre múltiplos participantes da cadeia de valor.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: low/minimal entry costs, pay-as-you-go mode, and great flexibility and scalability
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define elementos essenciais da proposta de valor cloud/SaaS: baixos custos de entrada, pagamento por uso e escalabilidade.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: The customer segments can be further divided into three categories. First, we have micro size business, which out of box standardized products are directly sold to... The second segment is small and medium size business with less than 1000 employees
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica a segmentação de mercado focada em micro e pequenas/médias empresas com diferentes necessidades de customização.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: instead of relying on upfront license fee, IT vendors are now collecting periodic subscription fee
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve a transformação do modelo de receita de taxas únicas para assinaturas periódicas em fornecedores estabelecidos.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: up to 50% of the initial ERP Co license fees do go to VAR
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra a gestão do ecossistema de parceiros através de compensação financeira no modelo SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing a Software Business
qualitative_analysis.quote: Will that be a pure software product, such as Microsoft Windows; a software–hardware combination (consider the iPhone); or a service, such as eBay? Having a service component in your offering lets you secure recurring revenue
qualitative_analysis.justification: Apresenta diferentes modelos de negócio de software (produto puro, combinação hardware-software, serviço) com ênfase na receita recorrente.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing a Software Business
qualitative_analysis.quote: The low marginal distribution cost (the cost of adding another user) means that additional sales can often directly translate into pure profit
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve a vantagem econômica fundamental do software: baixo custo marginal de distribuição permitindo economias de escala.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing a Software Business
qualitative_analysis.quote: offering a platform or an ecosystem in which your business can grow together with others that depend on yours
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define o modelo de negócio de plataforma com criação de valor através de ecossistema interdependente.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Digital sustainable business models: Using digital technology to integrate ecological sustainability into the core of business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Four archetypes - Sustainable Software Solutions (software to optimize resource consumption), Sustainable Product-Service Systems (physical products with digital complements for sustainability), Sustainability Intelligence (data analytics for sustainability assessment and decision-making), Digital Sustainable Platforms (multi-sided markets for circular economy)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve quatro arquétipos de modelos de negócio que integram sustentabilidade com tecnologia digital, incluindo plataformas e análise de dados.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Digital sustainable business models: Using digital technology to integrate ecological sustainability into the core of business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Recurring revenue/subscription (14 cases), One-time sales (9), Commission (6), Freemium/Add-on (8), Advertising (1)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica diversos modelos de receita utilizados em negócios sustentáveis digitais, com predominância de assinaturas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: When does a freemium business model lead to high performance? — A qualitative comparative analysis based on fuzzy Sets
qualitative_analysis.quote: Bundled freemium (adds value through premium sales with bundled features, new product/service combinations, interrelated reinforcing characteristics) and Fragmented freemium (creates value with free products then adds value with many fragmented upsell products that can be sold separately)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Distingue dois tipos de modelo freemium baseados em diferentes estratégias de criação e captura de valor.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: When does a freemium business model lead to high performance? — A qualitative comparative analysis based on fuzzy Sets
qualitative_analysis.quote: Network effects to increase user base; conversion from free to paid users; advertising sponsorship revenue from basic subscribers
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve mecanismos de criação de valor através de efeitos de rede e múltiplas fontes de receita no modelo freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Strategy and business model evolution at Adobe: Competing in digital media software industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Managing cloud infrastructure, data security and privacy issues became the primary activities
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica as atividades-chave na transição para cloud, incluindo gestão de infraestrutura e desafios de segurança.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Strategy and business model evolution at Adobe: Competing in digital media software industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Adobe entered into long-term agreements and partnerships with Amazon for AWS and Microsoft for Azure

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Navigating the paradox of global scaling
qualitative_analysis.quote: The recurrent revenue model of SaaS firms provides a steady cash flow
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca a vantagem financeira do modelo de receita recorrente em empresas SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Systematic Literature Review of Monetization in Mobile App: Strategies, Trends, Challenges, and Best Practices
qualitative_analysis.quote: The phrase 'freemium' refers to two different versions of a product: a free version with restricted functionality and a complete version that costs money but has more features and capabilities

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: Johnson et al. (2008) define a business model as interlocking elements that create and deliver value together: customer value proposition, profit formula, key resources, and key processes

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: unique features and business characteristics include 'Internet delivery', 'multitenancy', 'variety of pricing options', 'integration with platforms', 'analytics and improvements based on user-generated data', 'scalability, rapid elasticity'

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: pricing and operations characterize the provider's profit formula (revenue and cost) by utilizing key resources and implementing key processes
qualitative_analysis.justification: Relaciona estratégias de precificação e operações com a fórmula de lucro no modelo SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Optimal distinctiveness across revenue models: Performance effects of differentiation of paid and free products in a mobile app market

qualitative_analysis.article_title: E-business evolution: an analysis of mobile applications' business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: the creation of value in virtual markets is based on: efficiency –meaning the fast transmission of data on the Internet in order to reduce interconnection and negotiation; complementarity –meaning the capacity to propose products/services that are vertically or horizontally connected; lock-in –meaning the wish of customers or business partners to repeat transactions with the same firm because of the irreplaceable overall value; novelty –meaning the creation of new value
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve mecanismos de criação de valor em mercados virtuais incluindo lock-in e complementaridade.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: E-business evolution: an analysis of mobile applications' business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: three new mechanisms emerged: (i) in-app purchase, (ii) free as a service, and (iii) agreements with third parties

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on Cloud-Based Software Marketing Strategies Using Cloud Marketplace
qualitative_analysis.quote: Cloud service maximizes efficiency in information technology resource operation management... Various cloud-based software registered in the marketplace provide an improved user interface and guarantee expandability, stability, and security based on the benefits of cloud technology

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on Cloud-Based Software Marketing Strategies Using Cloud Marketplace

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Software as a service: Lessons from the video game industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: the main value proposition is the game itself, but in addition, GaaS offers new content that comes with updates and DLCs. GaaS also allows bugs to be fixed and provides a mechanism for feedback and communication between gamers and the development teams

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The SaaS Payoff: Measuring the Business Value of Provisioning Software-as-a-Service Technologies
qualitative_analysis.quote: The five essential characteristics (e.g. on demand self-service, measured service etc.) which underpin the SaaS model enables the case organisations to deliver nuanced and customisable value propositions to the customer

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The SaaS Payoff: Measuring the Business Value of Provisioning Software-as-a-Service Technologies

qualitative_analysis.quote: customer firms are exempted from much of the cost and effort of operating and financing their own IT infrastructure
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define proposta de valor cloud focando em eliminação de investimento em infraestrutura própria.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Understanding the influence of absorptive capacity and ambidexterity on the process of business model change – the case of on-premise and cloud-computing software
qualitative_analysis.quote: pay-per-use pricing method
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve transformação do modelo de receita para pagamento por uso no contexto de transição cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Understanding the influence of absorptive capacity and ambidexterity on the process of business model change – the case of on-premise and cloud-computing software
qualitative_analysis.quote: Initially low-end customers and SMEs over-served by existing ERP, then lines of business with standardised processes, later larger enterprises demanding private/hybrid cloud solutions
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve evolução de segmentação de mercado durante transição cloud, de PMEs para grandes empresas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: On-demand access to ERP/CRM/HRM systems over Internet, low/minimal entry costs, flexibility and scalability, eliminates need for upfront capital investment and own IT infrastructure
qualitative_analysis.justification: Lista benefícios principais da proposta de valor cloud/SaaS para sistemas empresariais.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: Shift from upfront perpetual license fees to periodic subscription fees (pay-as-you-go), continuous cash flow but less predictable
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve transformação fundamental do modelo de receita na transição para cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business models and opportunity creation: How IT entrepreneurs create and develop business models under uncertainty
qualitative_analysis.quote: Cloud gaming platform enabling games to run on servers and stream to end-user devices, avoiding illegal copying and second-hand markets, providing more durable market for games with flexible revenue models
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve modelo de cloud gaming com benefícios de proteção contra pirataria e flexibilidade de receita.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business models and opportunity creation: How IT entrepreneurs create and develop business models under uncertainty
qualitative_analysis.quote: Revenue sharing model among partners (portals/IPTV operators charge end-users, divide income between partners including G-cluster and game licensors)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define modelo de compartilhamento de receita entre múltiplos participantes do ecossistema de gaming.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Revenue models, in-app purchase, and the app performance: Evidence from Apple's App Store and Google Play
qualitative_analysis.quote: The revenue-sharing rule adopted by Apple (and also by all major stores) implies that, for each transaction, 70% of the revenue goes to the developer, while the platform owner retains 30% of it
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve regra padrão de compartilhamento de receita em marketplaces de aplicativos móveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Commercialization of Composite Software Resulting from Collaborative Research
qualitative_analysis.quote: coordinators would collect the payment from the customer and distribute it among involved providers according to their contribution
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve modelo colaborativo com coordenador distribuindo pagamentos baseado em contribuição.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: faster and more cost-effective delivery, maintenance, and after-sales services
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca vantagens de velocidade e custo na entrega e manutenção no modelo cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: Software renting shifted customers' capital investment onto operational costs
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve mudança fundamental de CAPEX para OPEX no modelo de aluguel de software.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing business models for cloud platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: we opted for the business model canvas as a business model representation
qualitative_analysis.justification: Referência explícita ao uso do Business Model Canvas para plataformas cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing business models for cloud platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: Development and execution environment for external developers; integration capabilities; matchmaking between customer segments
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define proposta de valor de plataforma focando em desenvolvimento, integração e matchmaking.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business Models for Cloud Computing: Experiences from Developing Modeling & Simulation as a Service Applications in Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Cloud-based simulation services without capital investment, scalable computing power, rapid elasticity, access to state-of-the-art hardware and software
qualitative_analysis.justification: Lista benefícios de simulação baseada em cloud focando em eliminação de investimento inicial e escalabilidade.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on a Decentralized SaaS Business Model
qualitative_analysis.quote: To avoid either one, we propose and analyze a distributed business model, which could be an alternative here
qualitative_analysis.justification: Propõe modelo descentralizado alternativo para SaaS visando evitar pontos únicos de falha.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Service-Centric Business Model in Cloud Environment
qualitative_analysis.quote: The CBM expresses a more efficient and flexible way of doing business and can make enterprises create new revenue streams by enhancing and extending their value propositions
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve modelo de negócio centrado em serviço cloud como meio de criar novas fontes de receita.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing Viable Multi-sided Data Platforms: The Case of Context-Aware Mobile Travel Applications
qualitative_analysis.quote: The platform provides a clean data repository about a city
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve plataforma de dados multi-sided para aplicativos de viagem com monetização de dados.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economic and business perspectives on smartphones as multi-sided platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: At its core, an application store is an auxiliary two-sided platform vis-à-vis the core platform
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define app stores como plataformas auxiliares de dois lados no ecossistema mobile.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Crushing Candy: The Free-to-Play Game in Its Connective Commodity Form
qualitative_analysis.quote: Rather than drawing on the traditional paid-for or 'premium' revenue model and charging an upfront fee per game, King derived its 2013 profits primarily via optional virtual consumption
qualitative_analysis.justification: Contrasta modelo free-to-play baseado em compras virtuais com modelo premium tradicional em games.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: commercial OSS releases ensure diffusion and create a marketplace for complementary proprietary products and services
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve estratégia de comercialização OSS criando marketplace para produtos e serviços complementares.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The relationship between Open Innovation and Strategy: data-driven analysis of the Mobile Value Services Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: commercialization of both the ideas of a company as well as ideas coming from other firms
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define inovação aberta como comercialização de ideias internas e externas em plataformas móveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: a business model consists of four interlocking elements – customer value proposition (CVP), profit formula, key resources, and key processes
qualitative_analysis.justification: Define estrutura de modelo de negócio para plataformas PaaS com quatro elementos interligados.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Five customer segments - IT startups, Systems integrators, Independent Software Vendors, Platform customers, Application customers
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica cinco segmentos de clientes distintos no ecossistema de plataformas PaaS.
